name: Sentinal of Cyrux
description:
A short Roguelike adventure created for the 7DayRoguelike game jam.

How to play Move using [W, S, A, D] keys or Arrow keys Spells

Heal: Key 1

Sonic Wave: Key 2

Fire Blast: Key 3
